page.title: 08DOMINION ESTATE
page.content: This block is mostly residential with a few shops and some open land.The roads are wide but they need resurfacing because they were built when the houses were built and are concrete slabs laid down for the road.New tarmac surfaces have been laid on the main roads this year and they are much better.All of the roads were named about the time that Canada was given its own Institution and so have names like "Dominion Road" ,"Treaty Road" and "liberty Road". Most of the people who live here can get to a food shop or hot-food takeaway shop by walking .The bus service has four buses into the City so it is quite easy to get about.
